values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_CRAFT_1
values.value:
In King's Landing, Arya found new opportunities to learn and grow. Her father, Ned, relented and hired a Braavosi Water Dancer to teach her to properly wield her new sword, Needle. But that idyllic life would not last, and the ties that bound her to her family were severed with one swing of an executioner's sword.

Craft any event gear to earn points! Northern Leathers materials for the Faceless Wolf gear set are available in other Arya Stark events. 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_CRAFT_2
values.value:
Alone, and with nothing but a coin, a promise, and a list, Arya traveled to Braavos to seek out Jaqen H'ghar and learn the ways of the Faceless Men. Yet to become Faceless, she must first become no one, abandon all that she loved, and everything that made her Arya Stark. Revenge drove her onwards, how could she continue if she must lose that too?

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Faceless Coin Trinket by defeating creatures in the Alone No Longer event. 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_PVE_1
values.value:
Despite escaping Kings Landing, Arya would fall into the clutches of the Lannisters. If not for her cunning, resourcefulness, and the intervention of Jaqen H'ghar, she might not have survived the trials at Harrenhal. She escaped for a time, until the hound came upon her. He captured her, intending to ransom her to her family. Yet they arrived too late to the bloody aftermath of the Red Wedding.

Defeat Lannister Bannermen to earn points! 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_PVE_2
values.value:
Her time among the Faceless Men gave Arya all the tools she needed to enact her revenge. Yet she knew she didn't belong here, she belonged back in Winterfell. Before she could return home, there was unfinished business she had to attend to, for House Frey still stood, and she would see to it that they were wiped out to a man. With a lighter heart and some matter of vengeance claimed, she would finally return home, to Sansa, Brann, and Jon.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Faceless Coin trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Valar Morghullis event. 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
The night is dark and full of terrors, and Arya is one of them. The culmination of all her hardships is here, among Winterfell she stands beside the siblings she's fought and killed for. As the Night King approaches, ready to cut down her brother, one deft maneuver of her blade shatters the Night King and his terrible army. A girl has saved her family, her home, and all of Westeros.

Defeat Frey Bannermen to earn points! 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_TRADE_1
values.value:
Having seemingly lost the rest of her family, and being forced to travel with the Hound, Arya had learned many harsh lessons. Most are centered on how life can be hard, brutal, and short. There are many nights where Arya fell asleep with an empty stomach, and naught but thoughts of vengeance to keep her warm.

Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_TRADE_2
values.value:
Joffrey, Jamie, Cersi, Tywin Lannister, the Hound, the Mountain, House Frey, even the Night King, all dead. With her list wiped clean, and her siblings safe, can there be a place for one such as Arya here? A blade alone cannot rebuild Kings Landing. All of her heroes traveled west to conquer the unknown, perhaps she could continue their voyage towards the setting sun...

Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Arya Stark' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_ARYA_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
Arya Stark was raised as a lady of Winterfell, told to be a proper girl like her sister Sansa. Yet she found that life mindnumbingly boring. All of her heroes were warrior women themselves; Visenya, Rhaenys, and Nymeria were all accomplished in their own right. She vowed to someday become like them instead, and show her family who she really could be.

Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the Arya Stark event:
* Northern Leathers are used to craft the Faceless Wolf gear set!
* Faceless Coin Faceless Coin Molds are used to craft the Faceless Coin trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Wolf and the Hound or What's West of Westeros events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the What's West of Westeros event ends!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_LINKTEST_1
values.value: Greetings! Your Kingdom has been selected for a first look at a new resource: Gems Seldom few citizens of Westeros adventure far enough east to reach the Jade Sea. However, those intrepid travelers who do can return with treasures, rare and valuable to merchants across the Seven Kingdoms! Gems are a new resource that can be used to purchase packs from the Offer Store. Gems are currently rare to come by, but lookout for more opportunities to purchase them in the future! Learn more in our Gem FAQ by tapping the button below! Learn More

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_204
values.value: Prepare for the new Rhoynish Voyager gear set!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_205
values.value: Use Hardy Silks to craft this indomitable gear!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_206
values.value: "Our wanderings are at an end. We have found a new home, and here we shall live and die."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_208
values.value: Craft these boots and burn bright astride your dragon!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_161
values.value: Level up Jaime, Arya, Cersei and Missandei!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_162
values.value: Level up Missandei, Daenerys, Gregor and Jaime!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_163
values.value: Level up Beric, Balon, Young Ned and Anguy!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_164
values.value: Level up Hodor, Roose, Euron and Yara!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TRINKET_91
values.value: Guide your dragon past the sunset with this trinket!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_HOLIDAY_GOLD_2
values.value:
Gold purchased from the Store awards points toward this event.

Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase.

Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

Gold purchased from the Store awards points toward this event.

Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase.

Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE_TASK
values.value: Conquer your adversaries in the neutral kingdom, demonstrate your strength, and seize the well-deserved spoils.

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_ARYA_PVE_2
values.value: "A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_ARYA_TRADE_1
values.value: "I know a killer. A real killer."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_ARYA_TRADE_2
values.value: And who will sail there to find it?

values.name: ALCHEMY_RECIPE_EVENT_ARYA_TROPHY_GENERIC_DESC
values.value: Spend your Braavosi Loan Trophies before the event ends and this recipe disappears!

values.name: BREACH_WIGHT_DESC
values.value: "They were touched by White Walkers, that's why they came back. That's why their eyes turned blue. Only fire will stop them." - Samwell Tarly

values.name: BUILDING_SHRINE_MAXIMUM_REACHED
values.value: You have reached your maximum daily prayers.

values.name: GOLD_PROMPT_EXTRA_WARNING
values.value: You are trying to spend a large amount of gold.

values.name: MONSTER_ARYA_1_DESC
values.value:
The Freys were considered a valuable ally due to their strategic control of the Crossing until they ignominiously broke guest right at the Red Wedding. 

Recent events have made opportunists out of many former allies of the Starks.

values.name: MONSTER_ARYA_3_DESC
values.value: "The Night King, first of the White Walkers, master of the living dead, he will bring about a night unending..."

values.name: MONSTER_LION_DESC
values.value: ''In a coat of gold or a coat of red, a lion still has claws; and mine are long and sharp, my lord, as long and sharp as yours." - The Rains of Castamere

values.name: MONSTER_LION_ELITE_DESC
values.value: ''In a coat of gold or a coat of red, a lion still has claws; and mine are long and sharp, my lord, as long and sharp as yours." - The Rains of Castamere

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_ARYA_DESC
values.value:
Your special event shipment for the Arya event can contain a variety of rewards.

You can claim up to four event shipments every 24 hours. If you claim them all, you will receive an Instant Boost!

values.name: SETTINGS_GOLD_DESCRIPTION
values.value: When you turn off the gold confirmation for the day, the dialog will still appear if you attempt to spend gold above the threshold.

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TITLE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STAGE_1_BODY
values.value:
The event has started and the Seats of Power are Unlocked for the next two hours on the neutral kingdom.

Please note the following changes to the event:
1) Cross-kingdom titles are now disabled.
2) Progressive rewards added for killing and wounding troops.
3) Seats in the neutral kingdom are unlocked immediately (no 3-hour wait).
4) Better healing buffs on the neutral kingdom.

values.name: DRIVEN_DRAGONFEEDXPBONUS_ALPHA_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Bonus to XP from Feeding your dragon
